channel.title: Body Parts on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Body Parts on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: We're Literally Navel-Gazing
item.description: Today in Tedium: It’s the one thing that separates humans from androids. Like the appendix, it’s functionally useless—minus the period before you’re actually born, when it’s pretty much the most important part of your body. Unlike the appendix, it’s visible and easy to spot. It, of course, is the belly button—one of the most-common but least-discussed parts of the human body. (Well, unless you’re Taylor Swift.) Innie or outie? The answer to that question could very well define your life.
